data.title: Christopher Meanings in English, Popularity, Origin
data.meta_description: Christopher is a Christian Greek baby boy name. Its meaning is "Bearer Of Christ". Christopher name origin is Greek. , Baby names meaning in Urdu, Hindi
data.text:
Christopher Name Meaning in English

What does the name Christopher mean? What is the meaning of the name Christopher, lucky number, lucky stone, origin and religion.

This verb also shows up in the English word Lucifer, “Light bearer” — literally “he bears light”.) Christopher is related to the names Chris meaning "Anointed" and christop meaning "follower of Christ" or "little Christ" As a given, or first name, Christopher has been in use since the 10th century.

Christopher Name Meaning, Origin & Details

Meaning: Bearer of christ Short Info: Explorer Christopher Columbus reached America in 1492, believing he had found the Westerly route to India from Spain. Details: From the Greek name Khristophoros, comprising of khristos, meaning "christ" and pherein, meaning "to bear". Gender: Boy Origin: Greek Religion: Christian Suitable for: Boys / Male / Guys Hardness: Hard to pronounce Uniqueness: Rare / It is unique name Short & Easy: No Syllables: 11 Letters and 1 Words

Christopher Name Numerology And Personality

Christopher has the numerology 9. The meaning of this name is Bearer of christ. People with numerology number 9 are the people who are thought to be very selfless and very kind towards the people and everyone around them. These are the people who are always thinking of others over themselves and they take care of everyone around them.

These people believe in creative expression and that is one reason why they are thought to be very humanitarian. The gender of this name Christopher is Boy. They always think of what they can do for the humanity.

The religion is christian. These are the people who are very obligatory of everything and they also only believe in giving and you will definitely never find these people in takers because they are always the givers. They do not wait for others to do things for them so that they can do it in return rather they are first one to make a move.
